slogan: Your specialist in electric scooters, electric bikes and gyroroue. Flexible vehicle rental. And advice from experts.
TextPromotedSection: Inmotion cares about your safety, that's why our shop offers a range of protection, clothing and accessories to ensure maximum protection
locationTitle: Rent a vehicle by the day!
locationTxt: Inmotion offers you to rent scooters, bikes or scooters by the day, do not hesitate to contact us for any request
contactTxt: For any questions or requests, we are at your disposal. Passionate and ourselves riders, it is with experience and professionalism that we inform you
